name: Radiance of Lightning's Edge
desc: If an ally target has 4 stack(s) or more of "Critical Boost" at the start of their turn, increases their SPD by 18% for 2 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: If an ally target has 4 stack(s) or more of "Critical Boost" at the start of their turn, increases their SPD by 27% for 2 turn(s).
